Package tool.common

Interface CommonMaze

All Known Implementing Classes:
MazePlan
public interface CommonMaze
Interface representing a game (maze) that works with CommonMazeObject objects and CommonField fields. The fields are placed in a grid, the dimensions of which are fixed. The grid representing the maze is initialized when an instance of the class is instantiated. The creation of the game (instance) is controlled through an object of the MazeConfigure class.
